properties.Name: MarketingEventCustomer
properties.Description: The Individual Customer's participation in or targeting by the Marketing Event.

Columns.Name: MarketingEventId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Marketing Event.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The starting date of the Customer's participation in or targeting by the Marketing Event.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The ending date of the Prospective Customer's participation in or targeting by the Marketing Event.

Columns.Name: CustomerMarketingEventParticipationNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Customer's participation in or targeting by the Marketing Event.
